Table of Contents

Class ROfXAndYAndTimeAndSubregionRecessedDetector

Namespace
Vts.MonteCarlo.Detectors
Assembly
Vts.dll

Implements IDetector. Tally for reflectance as a function of X and Y and TimeAndSubregionRecessed. This implementation works for Analog, DAW and CAW processing.

public class ROfXAndYAndTimeAndSubregionRecessedDetector : Detector, IDetector
